net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

Class OFCounterFuture

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal.OFMessageFuture<java.util.List<OFCounterReply>>
      • net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal.OFCounterFuture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Future<java.util.List<OFCounterReply>>

    public class OFCounterFuture
extends OFMessageFuture<java.util.List<OFCounterReply>>
    Used for waiting OFCounterReply message from switch when controller send a OFCounterRequest message for query a counter value.
